constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: 数组 b 有序（升序）
constraints.formal: b_i < b_{i+1} for all i from 1 to m-1

constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 数组 a 必须被划分为 m 个连续子数组，每个子数组的最小值等于 b 中对应位置的元素
constraints.formal: a can be divided into m subarrays such that min(subarray[i]) = b[i] for all i from 1 to m

constraints.name: partition_constraint
constraints.description: 每个元素属于且仅属于一个子数组
constraints.formal: Each element of a belongs to exactly one subarray
